attributes.action: round up the tax free allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The practice of deleting the last digit of taxpayers annual tax free allowance is unfair and deprives taxpayers of tax free income to which they are entitled. The Prime Minister should abolish the automatic rounding down of the annual tax free allowance and round up the tax free allowance if the last figure is 5 or above.
